word:
I am much pleased with the meeting. Thus far, not one voice of opposition is heard. Unity seems to prevail. I have had precious seasons of prayer in your behalf and I believe the Lord is working for you and Satan will be disappointed.--Letter 76, 1889, p. 1. (To Mary Kelsey-White, Oct. 29, 1889.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. Dec. 2, 1982
